thread.title: Ground News - Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season
thread.title_full: Ground News - Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season
text:
Summary by Ground News More than 1.65 million tickets were sold at Red Rocks in 2023, the city of Denver says. This makes it one of the five busiest venues in the world, according to a list put together by Billboard Magazine. The list has London's O2 Arena at the top, followed by Mexico City's Foro Sol stadium. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KDVR Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Media Conglomerate: Tribune Media Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season DENVER (KDVR) -- If you like live music and live in Colorado, chances are high that you've been to at least one show at Red Rocks. New numbers released by the city of Denver show just how much of a draw the iconic amphitheater is. Between concerts, films and other events held at the venue, more than 1.65 million tickets were sold in 2023.
